name: Advanced Emissions Solutions, Inc.
description: Advanced Emissions Solutions, Inc. (AESI) is a leading provider of innovative environmental solutions that enhance the performance of industrial processes and promote sustainability. Founded in 2011, AESI focuses on developing technologies that address the challenges of air pollution and greenhouse gas emissions. The company's core offerings include a suite of patented solutions designed to optimize the performance of coal-fired power plants and industrial processes, thereby reducing harmful emissions and improving compliance with environmental regulations. With a commitment to advancing clean technology, AESI also engages in research and development to create new products aimed at minimizing environmental impacts. The company's proprietary technologies, such as its activated carbon products, are utilized in various industries to capture and remove pollutants from emissions, ensuring cleaner air and a healthier environment. AESI's mission is to deliver innovative solutions that contribute to a sustainable future while providing economic value to its customers.
